title: Government revenue and spending in Greece 2024
summary: Overall Revenue, and Spending are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Revenue / spending in billion euros, in descending order is: 1. Spending, and lastly, 2. Revenue.
Spending reported the lowest Revenue / spending in billion euros about 85.23 in Year 2017
The greatest difference of Revenue / spending in billion euros between Revenue and Spending occurs at Year 2024 and the smallest difference occurs at 2019.

The minimum Revenue / spending in billion euros about 85.23, occured at 2017 by Spending.
